casebody.data:
SAVA KEHAYA, Appellant, v. PRESIDENT AND DIRECTORS OF THE MANHATTAN CO. et al., Appellees. No. 31. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 5, 1938. Frank L. Miller and Charles Seligson, both of New York City (Bernard Bayer, of New York City, on the brief), for appellant. Parker, Chapin & Flattau, of New York City (Henry L. Flattau, Milton Klein, and Charles Elbert, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellees. Hollander & Bernheimer, of New York City (Harry T. Zuclcer and Sydney J. Schwartz, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees Libaire & Co.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
